entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
